title: ‘We Did Nothing Wrong’: O’Connor Defends Team After Controversial Carapaz Crash
content:
'It happens a lot in cycling': Road blockage debate heats up after O'Connor deletes his Twitter account in wake of social media firestorm.

Read the full article at ‘We Did Nothing Wrong’: O’Connor Defends Team After Controversial Carapaz Crash on Velo.
author: ahood
